price: Wanti samiileefi dachii keessa jiru hundi kan Isaati. Hunduu Isaaf ajajamoodha.
arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ كُلّٞ لَّهُۥ قَٰنِتُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walahu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kullun lahu qānitūna
